name: Jigsaw Puzzle (itch) (maxtimoteo)
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle

Play the classic board game Jigsaw Puzzle. Drag and drop the pieces to complete a picture. Each Jigsaw puzzle is a 16 pieces image in format 4 x 4. The pictures are from the games Bomb Squirrel and Hit Block.

Some pictures include constructions with cartoon shaped animals as characters. Other pictures also include cube shaped fruits that a character needs to destroy using a ball.

Details:

- The game has 25 puzzles
- Every puzzle starts with some pieces in it's correct position
- Some images are very easy to solve, but there are also some difficult images
- Images from the Bomb Squirrel game have cartoons of squirrel, cat, monkey, penguin and others
- Images from the Hit Block game have cube shaped images including fruit, halloween elements and others

http://www.maxtimoteo.com
